general_advisory: Apply well decomposed Farm Yard Manure/vermicompost during last ploughing in the field. Before raising any crop, go for collection of soil sample and test it in nearby soil testing laboratory. Apply balanced fertilizers in all the crops as per soil test based recommendations mentioned in the soil health card.

advisory: Present weather may cause blast infestation in rice.
Cloudy weather and rainfall may cause bacterial leaf blight and bacterial leaf streak disease in paddy.
After rainfall chances of tobacco caterpillar and red hairy caterpillar infestation in groundnut.
Expected weather may cause rust and tikka disease in groundnut.
Expected weather may cause stem rot in groundnut.
Present weather may cause root and stalk rot in maize.
Present weather may cause rust infestation in green gram.
Present weather may cause wilting in tomato and brinjal field.
Chances of late blight infestation in tomato field.
Present weather may cause wilting in tomato and brinjal field.
Chances of late blight infestation in tomato field.
Present weather may cause downy mildew in Cucurbitaceous crops.
Chances of red pumpkin beetle infestation in cucurbitaceous crops like cucumber, bottle gourd, and watermelon.
